detail.description:
Ang iyong suking loan app. Loans have never been this easy.
We provide you with safe, easy loans to help with your financial needs.
+ Be in control of your loan application and loan account
+ Receive money via InstaPay and PesoNet directly to your account for cash availments
+ Know when to pay with zukì’s dashboard
+ Avail of our loan products –Hooloogan, MotorsikLOAN, Car4Cash, and Personal Loan
> Enjoy Hooloogan – pagkatapos mag-bayad, pwede mag-reavail without re-applying
> MotorsikLOAN – Low down payment para sa pangarap mong motor
> Car4Cash – OR/CR lang and your car stays with you
> Personal Loan – collateral-free multi-purpose cash loan


        more
